description: MCP server lists recipe implementation prompts
steps: Connect to MCP server at /api/mcp
Request prompts/list
Verify response includes implement-<slug> prompts for each recipe
Verify each prompt has description mentioning recipe title

description: MCP server lists cookbook implementation prompts
steps: Connect to MCP server at /api/mcp
Request prompts/list
Verify response includes implement-<slug> prompts for each cookbook
Verify each prompt has description mentioning cookbook title

description: Recipe implementation prompt returns resource message
steps: Connect to MCP server at /api/mcp
Request prompts/get for implement-<recipe-slug>
Verify response includes user message
Verify message content type is resource
Verify resource URI matches recipe resource URI
Verify resource text contains implementation instruction

description: Cookbook implementation prompt returns resource message
steps: Connect to MCP server at /api/mcp
Request prompts/get for implement-<cookbook-slug>
Verify response includes user message
Verify message content type is resource
Verify resource URI matches cookbook resource URI
Verify resource text contains implementation instruction
